This text should be long enough to demonstrate and test the text wrapping function.","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Another long text entry to test the scroll function and the general user interface of the changelog dialog.","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Fifth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Sixth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Seventh test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Eighth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Ninth test entry","type":0},{"text":"TEST: Tenth test entry","type":0}]}

data.name: Version_1_0_0
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.0.0","date":"2023-09-15","modifications":[{"text":"Initial release of eTools Ultimate","type":0},{"text":"Basic functionality for editing items","type":0},{"text":"Support for loading and saving Spec_Item.txt files","type":0},{"text":"Dark mode UI implemented","type":0}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_0
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.0","date":"2023-11-15","modifications":[{"text":"Added support for analyzing defineItem.h to extract item IDs","type":0},{"text":"Added support for analyzing mdlDyna.inc to obtain model filenames","type":0},{"text":"Reorganization of the General area with new field order","type":1},{"text":"Moved icon display from Visual Properties to the General area","type":1},{"text":"Improved image loading with support for DDS files","type":4},{"text":"Changed tradeable control to a modern toggle switch","type":1},{"text":"Updated changelog with a grouped accordion view","type":5},{"text":"Added dedicated changelog page","type":0},{"text":"Added dedicated changelog page","type":5},{"text":"Added maximum stack size limit (9999) with help text","type":0}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_3
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.3","date":"2024-06-20","modifications":[{"text":"Extended DDS texture preview with zoom controls","type":0},{"text":"Added detailed tooltips explaining DDS format options","type":0},{"text":"Improved transparency handling for DDS textures with pink backgrounds","type":4},{"text":"Implemented intelligent format detection for better DDS rendering","type":0},{"text":"Added pixel-perfect rendering for clearer icon display","type":4},{"text":"Consistent dark mode formatting across all dialog components","type":1},{"text":"Removed item rarity field from the editor interface","type":2},{"text":"Optimized changelog display with improved layout","type":4},{"text":"Fixed various UI formatting inconsistencies","type":3}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_4
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.4","date":"2024-06-25","modifications":[{"text":"Completely redesigned DDS texture preview with extended zoom options (1x-10x)","type":4},{"text":"Optimized display of DDS textures with pixel-perfect scaling","type":4},{"text":"Dynamic size adjustment of the preview window based on zoom level and image content","type":0},{"text":"Improved dialog user interface with clearer arrangement and better accessibility","type":4},{"text":"Removed duplicate close buttons in the preview window","type":3},{"text":"Optimized dialog size for different zoom levels","type":1},{"text":"More precise image rendering function for DDS textures","type":4},{"text":"Improved dialog interaction prevents accidental closure","type":3},{"text":"Consistent dark mode styling across all preview window components","type":4}]}

data.name: Version_1_2_5
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.2.5","date":"2024-07-02","modifications":[{"text":"Converted table layout to a compact grid layout in the 'Collect' tab","type":1},{"text":"Implemented SortableGridItem component for drag-and-drop functionality in grid format","type":0},{"text":"Optimized item display with two-column layout for better space efficiency","type":4},{"text":"Redesigned probability fields to display inline with element names","type":1},{"text":"Fixed data loading issues by passing availableItems directly through the component hierarchy","type":3},{"text":"Improved layout of collection items for better visualization and reduced scrolling","type":4},{"text":"Removed faulty references to NPCTab that caused linter errors","type":3},{"text":"Optimized formatting with uniform width constraints for probability inputs","type":4}]}

data.name: Version_1_3_1
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.3.1","date":"2026-08-19","developerText":"This update focuses on UI consistency and bug fixes. We've streamlined the interface by removing unnecessary filter buttons and ensuring all pages follow the same design patterns. The header improvements make it much easier to identify items at a glance.","imagePath":"/Assets/Icons/AboutIcon.png","categories":{"added":[],"changed":[{"text":"Removed Filter buttons from AccessoryPage, HonorPage, TerrainObjectPage, and WorldPage","type":1},{"text":"Corrected AccessoryPage header to show user-friendly names instead of technical identifiers","type":1},{"text":"Standardized button layout and spacing across all editor pages","type":1}],"fixed":[{"text":"Fixed ObjectPage scale field Grid structure bug","type":3},{"text":"Fixed button color inconsistencies across all pages","type":3},{"text":"Fixed Grid.Row attribute issues in form layouts","type":3}],"improved":[{"text":"Improved header structure with proper visual hierarchy","type":4},{"text":"Enhanced user experience with cleaner interface design","type":4},{"text":"Improved consistency between ItemPage and other editor pages","type":4}]}}

data.name: Version_1_3_0
data.value: {"version":"Version 1.3.0","date":"2026-08-19","developerText":"This major update represents a complete overhaul of the eTools Ultimate interface. We've modernized the entire application with the WPF UI library, bringing a consistent and professional look across all editor pages. The new design improves usability while maintaining all existing functionality.","imagePath":"/Assets/Icons/PersonalizationIcon.png","categories":{"added":[{"text":"Complete UI redesign with modern WPF UI library integration","type":0},{"text":"Added comprehensive icon management system with proper resource inclusion","type":0},{"text":"Enhanced HonorPage with modern form layout and proper data binding","type":0},{"text":"Implemented proper MVVM pattern with ObservableObject and RelayCommand","type":0},{"text":"Improved project structure with proper resource management","type":0}],"changed":[{"text":"Standardized dark/light theme support across all pages","type":1},{"text":"Unified ListView design across all pages (ItemPage, AccessoryPage, MotionPage, HonorPage)","type":1},{"text":"Implemented consistent two-column layout with ListView and detail forms","type":1},{"text":"Standardized action buttons (Undo, Redo, Save, Expert, Filter, Add, Delete) across all pages","type":1},{"text":"Updated TerrainObjectPage and WorldPage with standardized button colors","type":1},{"text":"Standardized color scheme: Blue (#2F70AF) for Add buttons, Red (#FD292F) for Delete buttons","type":1}],"fixed":[{"text":"Fixed XAML resource resolution errors and property element placement issues","type":3},{"text":"Fixed namespace issues for ViewModels and resolved binding errors","type":3},{"text":"Added missing event handlers for UI interactions","type":3},{"text":"Resolved WPF UI library resource conflicts and theme switching issues","type":3},{"text":"Fixed ObjectPage button layout and removed unnecessary scale controls","type":3}],"improved":[{"text":"Improved MotionPage with consistent preview window design","type":4},{"text":"Enhanced navigation menu with high-quality icons and proper routing","type":4},{"text":"Enhanced user experience with consistent design language across all editor pages","type":4}]}}
